parameters.name: BandwidthPackageId
parameters.description: The ID of the NAT service plan.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotency of the request. You can use the client to generate a client token. Make sure that a unique client token is used for each request. The **token** can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length. For more information, see [How to ensure idempotence](~~36569~~).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region where the NAT gateway resides. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
